item.description:
Tavern on the Water in Charlestown Navy Yard is a lovely outdoor pub that's by the Boston Harbor.

There are *3* easy ways to get there:
1. Catch the F4 Ferry from Aquarium (Long Wharf) directly to Charlestown Navy Yard. Ferry runs every half an hour after 6:30pm. Here's the MBTA website:
http://www.mbta.com/s...

2. 25-min walk from North Station. Follow the Red brick road (Freedom Trail) to The Constitution, then continue to walk along the harbor. The Tavern is one block away from the Constitution (where the big naval ship is).

3. Catch the MGH shuttle to Charlestown Navy Yard from either

  • corner of Staniford Street and William Cardinal Oconnell Way (close to Charles / MGH T stop)
    http://maps.google.co...
  • North Station on Causeway Street between Canal and Haverhill Street OPPOSITE the TD Banknorth Garden.
    (Shuttle runs every 15 mins before 7:45pm and every 30 mins after that).


Get off at the final stop (Building 149 on 13th St), you are a hop away from the Tavern: http://maps.google.co...


If you need further directions, give me a buzz at 617-372-3664.

Cheers
KC
